11.text: Master number 11: intuition, inspiration, spiritual light.

22.text: Master number 22: master builder, large-scale achievements.

33.text: Master number 33: master teacher, service and compassion.

13.text: Karmic 13: hard work, delays, transformation through effort.

14.text: Karmic 14: instability, misuse of freedom, lessons in discipline.

16.text: Karmic 16: pride and downfall, spiritual awakening after loss.

19.text: Karmic 19: lessons of ego, isolation, independence.

1-6.text: Leadership (1) combines well with responsibility (6). Strong balance of vision and care.

1-2.text: Challenging dynamic: independence of 1 clashes with sensitivity of 2.
